ðŸ”¥ BookmarkCanvas | Kotlin
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Organize and visualize bookmarks within IntelliJ IDEs for improved navigation and understanding of relationships between bookmarked code locations
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Add bookmarks to a visual canvas from various IntelliJ IDE locations (tool window, modal dialog, canvas itself) â€¢ Navigate to bookmarks by double-clicking on the canvas â€¢ Remove, move, and zoom/pan the canvas â€¢ Save/load canvas layouts â€¢ Create and remove connections between bookmarks
ðŸ“– Summary: This IntelliJ plugin provides a visual canvas for managing bookmarks. Users can add, arrange, connect, and navigate bookmarks, saving and loading layouts. It supports configuration of context display and layout styles for enhanced code organization and understanding.
